questions.questionTitle: Who are the speakers talking about?
What does the man say about Perry Fondue?
What does the woman say about Perry Fondue?

script:
� Is there anything interesting in the paper today?
� Well, Perry Fondue died yesterday.
� Really? That's too bad. I loved him in Too Noisy on the Eastern Front. He was great in those kind of macho, tough-guy roles.
� Yeah, but he wasn't one dimensional. He could also play sensitive parts. Didn't he win an Oscar for that love story, The Russian Patient?
